name: Final Embrace Master
prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 17 AND @int_score >= 3 AND (@race:naga OR @race:serpentfolk OR @ability:constrict) AND @feat:ability_focus#constrict AND @feat:final_embrace AND @feat:final_embrace_horror AND @bab >= 9
descriptionText: Few creatures can survive the crushing horror of your Final Embrace.
benefitText: Double the number of damage dice for your constrict special attack.
